en: The whole classroom was silent as a cicada in winter, with students listening intently.
pinyin: zhěng gè jiào shì jìng ruò hán chán, xué shēng men zhuān xīn tīng jiǎng.

en: A night as quiet as a cicada in winter makes the heart as calm as water.
pinyin: jìng ruò hán chán de yè wǎn, ràng rén xīn jìng rú shuǐ.

en: What a big apple!
pinyin: hǎo kān de píng guǒ!

en: This beautiful diamond is worth a lot of money.
pinyin: zhè ge kān jīng měi de zuàn shí zhí hěn duō qián.

en: The watermelon's size looks very sweet.
pinyin: nà ge xī guā de kān hǎo xiàng hěn tián.

en: I'm so happy!
pinyin: hǎo gāo xìng a!

en: This building is really tall!
pinyin: zhè gè jiàn zhú zhēn gāo!
